verbs.description: jcpenney [V: is] taking advantage of the death of babies r us jcpenney is rolling out baby shops to 500 locations it will offer bigger items such as cribs high chairs and strollers that would otherwise only be offered online neil saunders lowe toys r us ellison marvin ellison james starke mike robbins globaldata retail
